title: Hexo
content:
## 安裝需求

在開始安裝 Hexo 之前，必須先在電腦安裝下列工具：

*   Node.js

*   Git

確認安裝版本
* node.js

        $ node -v

* npm

        $ npm -v

## Hexo 環境建置
*   安裝 Hexo

        $ npm install -g hexo-cli

*   確認安裝成功

        $ hexo -v

*   初始化 Hexo

        $ hexo init <資料夾名稱>

## 目錄結構


* node_modules
* scaffolds
* source
    * _posts
* themes
* _config.yml
* .gitignore
* package.json
* package-lock.json

### theme

**加入landscape主題**

        $ git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-theme-landscape themes/landscape

可參考https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-theme-landscape

**加入next主題**

        $ git clone https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next themes/next

可參考https://github.com/theme-next/hexo-theme-next

其他主題可參考https://hexo.io/themes/


### _config.yml

        title: Hexo # 部落格名稱
        subtitle: '' # 部落格小標題
        description: '' # 部落格描述
        keywords: # 部落格關鍵字
        author: John Doe # 部落格作者
        language: en # 部落格語系(可以調成zh-TW)
        timezone: '' # 標準時間

## Hexo 指令
常用的Hexo指令

* 新增文章

        $hexo new '文章名稱'

* 產生靜態檔案

        $ hexo generate

* 開啟模擬伺服器

        $ hexo server

* 清除暫存檔案

        $ hexo clean

* 產生靜態檔案並且部署到GitHub上

        $ hexo deploy

## 一鍵佈署到Github上

**在Github上建立一個專案並且記錄網址**


* 安裝 hexo-deployer-git.

        $ npm install hexo-deployer-git --save
        
更改 _config.yml 的現有資料，並新增以下組態:


        url:'https://username.github.io/project'(網址要改)
        .
        .
        .
        deploy:
          type: git
          repo: https://github.com/<username>/<project>(網址要改)
          # example, https://github.com/hexojs/hexojs.github.io
          branch: gh-pages



執行以下指令

        $ hexo clean 
        $ hexo deploy



參考連結:https://hexo.io/zh-tw/docs/github-pages

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
